runiv 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Packages in an R-universe

Source: R/runiv_packages.R
runiv_packages.Rd

List all packages available in an R-universe.

runiv_packages(universe, package = NULL, version = NULL)

Arguments

universe

A length one character. User or organization name of the the R-universe owner.
package

either NULL, or a length one character. Package name (see details).
version

either NULL, or a character vector. Package version (see details).

Value

a data.frame if both package and version are not NULL, a character vector otherwise.

Details

This function gives access to three types of information, depending on how many arguments are different from NULL:

  • runiv_packages(universe) lists all packages in the R-universe universe.

  • runiv_packages(universe, package), where package is a string, lists all available version for package package in this universe.

  • runiv_packages(universe, package, version) lists all available builds for package package of version version (specified as a string).

The argument version is ignored if package is NULL.

Author

Valerio Gherardi

Examples

( packages <- runiv_packages("vgherard") )

#> [1] "fcci"     "gsample"  "kgrams"   "r2r"      "runiv"    "sbo"      "scribblr"
( versions <- runiv_packages("vgherard", packages[[1]]) )

#> [1] "1.0.0"
( versions <- runiv_packages("vgherard", packages[[1]], versions[[1]]) )
